TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_pinkyalan, title = pinkyalan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/pinkyalan} }

S.FORM: pinkyalan pinkyalan taga siki pinqutux ryax ta mlahang qu yaya, hwa su nyux mtkari kmal lpi? hwa su wal yugun qaya qasa la. aw ta pinkyalan maha qaya qani raw maku ra, hwasu wal rasun lpi?
pinkyalan pinkyalan taga siki pinqotox ryax ta mlahang qo yaya, hwa so nyox mtkari kmal lpi? hwa so wal yogon qaya qasa la. aw ta pinkyalan maha qaya qani raw mako ra, hwaso wal rason lpi?
